reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 114/01: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMIT FOR 2001 UNDER SECTION 368.2 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — TIME LIMIT FOR 2001 UNDER SECTION 368.2 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 114/01: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMIT FOR 2001 UNDER SECTION 368.2 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. The time limit for 2001 under subsection 368.2 (1) of the Act is extended to May 31, 2001. O. Reg. 114/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The time limit for 2001 under subsection 368.2 (1) of the Act is extended to May 31, 2001. O. Reg. 114/01, s. 1.
